text: @TeamPelosi He'll have to lie about the reasons for people dying, which happened here before we knew what Covid-19 was, & which apparently is the modus-operandi in Russia, where they say people who die are assigned as victims of heart, kidney, lung failure... Or dying away at home, who knows
